channel.title: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oujJABn.png[/img]
[B]23 ACTIVELY PLAYING IN UNDER 24 HOURS[/B] - [I]Don't miss out![/I] SERVER LAUNCHED 4/16
[B]NOW THAT THIS IS AN ADVERTISEMENT I CAN FINALLY PUT THE LINK HERE. [SIZE=4]>>> [url=http://forum.islandsrsps.com/]http://forum.islandsrsps.com/[/url][/B]
[I]Come join the fun guys! <3 <3 <3[/I]
[B]Latest update summary:[/B] A couple of NEW PICTURES have been posted on the forums ^_^ Come and join the community early!
For those of you who knew of or played my former server Shilo, [i]Islands[/i] is very similar in regards to play-style, but with new locations, monsters, and a better feel in general. The fact that everything I need is pretty much in the game areas I'm using, as opposed to spawning everything, makes for easier development, and therefore more updates more frequently. Those who know me or know my previous works know that I love old-schoolish gameplay with a very simplistic approach. I enjoy community based environments that are more close (figuratively and literally, as the playable areas in the server are close-quarters) and tight-knit than other servers, which is my goal for [i]Islands[/i].
[SIZE=3][B]Media[/B][/SIZE]
[b]Initial media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jOqHPIB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FNCHvXM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SC9yfbQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3VIMH5P.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Kktvlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vyv6mYG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qCqn4fE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7tkjRbN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2jZr5pk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8yP7qeA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R11uXIh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R9CvzNH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BUjziUD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WXaQPRR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7AJgAoI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1CY0zQZ.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][b]Content[/b][/SIZE] # All released skills working near 100%; includes all but Farming and Agility # Combat system works almost flawlessly, including auto-retaliation and aggression # Solid dialogue and quest systems, although quests are still in question # Very unique content and areas, based mostly (if not all) on islands and dungeons # Programmed with near-perfection in mind, so bugs and kinks in current content are pretty scarce # Community and goal oriented, geared more towards training and an economy than PKing # Huge opportunity for more unique, interesting, and fun updates
I'll update this topic as I go, although most things are already programmed. I started with a nearly scratch source and built almost everything myself, skills and other content included.
Please spread the word and keep this topic up top, you won't regret it. Thanks for reading![/QUOTE]

item.title: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
item.dc:creator: @Unrated_ko Unrated ko
item.description:
@Unrated_ko wrote:

23 ACTIVELY PLAYING IN UNDER 24 HOURS - Don’t miss out!
SERVER LAUNCHED 4/16

NOW THAT THIS IS AN ADVERTISEMENT I CAN FINALLY PUT THE LINK HERE.
[SIZE=4]>>> http://forum.islandsrsps.com/

Come join the fun guys! <3 <3 <3

Latest update summary: A couple of NEW PICTURES have been posted on the forums Come and join the community early!

For those of you who knew of or played my former server Shilo, Islands is very similar in regards to play-style, but with new locations, monsters, and a better feel in general. The fact that everything I need is pretty much in the game areas I’m using, as opposed to spawning everything, makes for easier development, and therefore more updates more frequently. Those who know me or know my previous works know that I love old-schoolish gameplay with a very simplistic approach. I enjoy community based environments that are more close (figuratively and literally, as the playable areas in the server are close-quarters) and tight-knit than other servers, which is my goal for Islands.

[SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE]

Initial media:








[SIZE=3]Content[/SIZE]

All released skills working near 100%; includes all but Farming and Agility

Combat system works almost flawlessly, including auto-retaliation and aggression

Solid dialogue and quest systems, although quests are still in question

Very unique content and areas, based mostly (if not all) on islands and dungeons

Programmed with near-perfection in mind, so bugs and kinks in current content are pretty scarce

Community and goal oriented, geared more towards training and an economy than PKing

Huge opportunity for more unique, interesting, and fun updates

I’ll update this topic as I go, although most things are already programmed. I started with a nearly scratch source and built almost everything myself, skills and other content included.

Please spread the word and keep this topic up top, you won’t regret it. Thanks for reading![/QUOTE]

Read full topic
item.source: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
